title: Bilgewater Act I Reward Issue
body: Everytime I opened the client again my progress towards the icon is lost that I have to choose the side (Graves/TF) again, indeed any progress for playing ARAM games has never been shown for this couple of days. Please help.

replies.body:
Hey leotam1234 ~

After looking into your account, I am seeing that you are now making progress on the objectives.

Are you still having this issue? If so, please let me know! 

If choosing a path is still failing, we would like to test your account and see if we can make the choice on the back-end. Would you be okay with this? If so, just let me know which path you'd like to choose and we'll do the rest!

Hopefully the issue is resolved, though. :)
